# Gene annotation 

```{r}
library(org.Mm.eg.db)
```

```{r}
mm <- org.Mm.eg.db
my.symbols <- res_pbs_tb$gene
map <- select(mm, 
              keys = my.symbols,
              columns = c("ENTREZID", "SYMBOL", "ENSEMBL"),
              keytype = "ENSEMBL")
```

```{r}
ad.df <- left_join(res_pbs_tb, map, by = c("gene" = "ENSEMBL"))
```

```{r}
ad.df <- ad.df[!duplicated(ad.df$gene),]
```
